name: Wake'emUpPublicSpeakingwithTomAntion
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Internet and pro speaking multimillionaire Tom Antion is a veteran of over 3000 paid speaking presentations in 12 countries. He's the author of "Wake 'em Up Business Presentations" and "The Wake 'em Up Video Professional Speaking System". You will learn insider pro speaking tips that will make you the star of your next speech or business meeting. 

Make sure you put the Alexa App on your phone and arrange this briefing so it comes up first in your news. Tom guarantees it will be more valuable to you than hearing a bunch of politicians fight it out on the radio LOL
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
